function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Physical activity may ameliorate pathological outcomes of upper respiratory tract infections urti , including covid-19, by reducing excessive local inflammation and inducing the secretion of anti-inflammatory cytokines.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical activity can be effective in ameliorating mental well-being and preventing symptoms of mental health disorders such as depression and anxiety.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Examination of changes in physical activity levels during self-quarantine may provide insight into the impact of restrictions on physical activity and its correlation with individual well-being.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term detraining due to forced stop of physical activity","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through droplet and close contact","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contamination through bodily fluids and transmission through oral or conjunctival routes","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of infectiousness changes over time","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated wastewater with pathogens","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for the health system and availability of intensive care","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent variable is infection ratio","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge of key epidemiological drivers for urban vector-borne diseases","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of novel arboviruses into new areas","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of viruses like zika and chikungunya across 73 countries and leading to public health emergencies","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in estimating urban mosquito species distributions and abundance, leading to poor estimation of urban disease exposure","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in heat-related deaths due to hotter days and more frequent heatwaves","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of climate change on human health","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on post-evaluation of known outbreak cases for understanding virus transmission risks","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragile health security capacities leading to ineffective handling of covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of disease prevention programs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing disease prevention programs disrupted by focus on covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overloaded health systems and fear of infection deter people from seeking medical care, leading to potential high mortality rates and strain on health facilities.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of widespread transmission in public settings","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on the development of a vaccine","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the analysis and synthesis of a wide range of materials from online sources.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical assessment of covid-19 impacts","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infectious virus transmitted through droplets from infected individuals.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed reaction to pandemic threat","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downplaying the threat of covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low incidence of reported human infections","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of active cases contributing to virus circulation","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus concentration below the limit of detection of the assay","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal treatment for virus inactivation","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retesting for confirmation of results","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of sars-cov-2 genome sequences","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low sensitivity of real-time rt-qpcr assay","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling of pcr reagents and samples in a laboratory setting poses a risk of contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested pcr with multiple cycles can increase the risk of contamination and false positives.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sample rna during cdna synthesis can lead to contamination and inaccurate results.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested rt-pcr assays without standardization for sars-cov-2 detection","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of sewage with viral rna from covid-19 patients","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and
